options.name: Host
options.description: The sharepoint host to use for querying data. This will typically look like `https://[TENANT-NAME].sharepoint.com`.

options.name: Authentication Host
options.description: The authentication host to use for querying data.  This should usually be set to the default value of "https://accounts.accesscontrol.windows.net".

options.name: Client ID
options.description: The client ID to use for authentication.

options.name: Client Secret
options.description: The secret to use for authentication.

options.name: Tenant ID
options.description: The tenant id to authenticate inside of.

options.name: Subsite Search Path
options.description: Limit search to only the specified subsite path (optional).  Subsites can be specified by name, relative path, or full absolute path to include the host and scheme (e.g., https://[TENANT-NAME].sharepoint.com/sites/mysubsite)

options.name: Ignore Entities
options.description: Comma delimited list of entities that you do not want to lookup.

options.name: Ignore Domain Regex
options.description: Domains that match the given regex will not be looked up.

options.name: Ignore IP Regex
options.description: IPs that match the given regex will not be looked up.

options.name: Exact Match Search
options.description: Check if you want each Sharepoint search to be an exact match with found entities (i.e., wrap the search term in quotes).
